PHRASE.LANG: The Stately Home is the perfect personal apartment space for those people who like the finer things in life. With its large and beautiful grounds and a direct link through to the "Masquerade Ball - The Ballroom", this space is a must-have. Also comes with five free rewards. [#Legal]

Le Manoir constitue l’espace Appartement personnel idéal pour les amateurs de sophistication. Cet espace incontournable comporte de grands et superbes terrains, permettant d’accéder directement à l’espace "Bal masqué – La salle de bal". Il comporte aussi cinq récompenses gratuites. [#Legal]

Das Herrschaftliche Anwesen ist der perfekte persönliche Apartment-Raum für diejenigen, die einen gehobeneren Lebensstandard zu schätzen wissen. Mit seinen wunderschönen und weitläufigen Außenanlagen und einem direkten Zugang zum "Maskenball - Der Ballsaal" ist dieser Raum ein absolutes Muss. Dazu gibt es fünf Gratis-Belohnungen. [#Legal]

Alle persone cui piace il lato più raffinato della vita, la casa signorile sembrerà lo spazio perfetto da adibire ad appartamento personale. Il terreno ampio e meraviglioso e il collegamento diretto a "Ballo in maschera - Sala da ballo" rendono questo spazio un must. Include anche cinque ricompense gratuite. [#Legal]

El Hogar majestuoso es el apartamento personal ideal para aquellos sibaritas amantes de las cosas buenas de la vida. Con su grandísimo y hermoso terreno y un enlace directo al Baile de máscaras: “The Ballroom”, ¡este artículo es imprescindible! Viene con cinco recompensas incluidas. [#Legal]

The Stately Home is the perfect personal apartment space for those people who like the finer things in life. With its large and beautiful grounds and a direct link through to the "Masquerade Ball - The Ballroom", this space is a must-have. Also comes with five free rewards. [#Legal]
